meanings.definition: Unable to be matched or equaled.
meanings.sent1: Her talent was unmatchable by anyone in the competition.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of the sunset was truly unmatchable.
meanings.sent3: The cat's unmatchable ability to find the best napping spots always amazed its owner.
meanings.sent4: The unmatchable speed of the cheetah left all other animals in awe.
meanings.sent5: The unmatchable flavor of her homemade cookies made them a hit at the bake sale.

meanings.definition: Not able to be matched or compared.
meanings.sent1: The unique taste of the exotic fruit was unmatchable by any other.
meanings.sent2: The unmatchable bond between the twins was evident to everyone who knew them.
meanings.sent3: The unmatchable size of the giant pumpkin at the fair surprised all the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her unmatchable determination to succeed inspired her peers.
meanings.sent5: The unmatchable strength of the superhero saved the city from disaster.
